articles.author: Virginia Sole-Smith
articles.title: Is Mealtime Miserable? Try This. - NYT Parenting
articles.description: ‘Division of responsibility in feeding’ is an approach that may help picky eaters and food-fixated kids alike. What it won’t do: make anyone finish their broccoli.
articles.content:
CreditJuliette Toma
The other night, we had ice cream for dessert. My daughters, ages 6 and 2, were very excited because it is freezing outside, so we arent eating a lot of ice cream at the moment. Kids dont care much about seasonal menu planning when rainbo… [+10806 chars]

articles.author: Aurelien Breeden
articles.title: Notre-Dame Will Not Host Christmas Mass, a First in More Than 200 years
articles.description: The Paris cathedral, which suffered a devastating fire this year, is still closed to the public as reconstruction efforts slowly get underway.
articles.content:
Its very hard for everyone, its yet another blow, Mr. Finot said by telephone on Monday. 
President Emmanuel Macron of France vowed after the fire that Notre-Dame would be rebuilt in five years, a tight deadline that the authorities are sticking to so far. … [+1004 chars]
